summary: Website project to add a dedicated Tips page containing drinking/water tips content.

existing_features.title: Create a new dedicated Tips page route at "/tips" and add it to the TanStack Router route tree so it is accessible as a normal page in the SPA.
Implement the Tips page UI containing the drinking-water tips content as a readable, responsive layout using existing UI components and Tailwind styling, with all user-facing text in English.
Add navigation access to the Tips page from the app’s header navigation (desktop) and mobile menu so users can reach "/tips" easily.

Apply a cohesive visual theme for the new Tips page that matches the existing site’s warm “Golden Water” aesthetic (warm gold/amber neutrals), and keep styling consistent with the current layout components.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a new dedicated “Tips” page on the website and add the drinking-water tips content to it.

projectName: Add dedicated Tips page with drinking-water tips
